xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/562527-Bloody Rage of Bigfoot 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fT4hmX5YtixXMK7XMkUGAQX85ux.jpg From the creators of Pus-E The Clown and Brandy or Freedom comes this heart stopping ride through a world where the science of Cryptozoology careens headfirst into the ancient and forgotten works of witchcraft. Two escaped convicts -- the alluring Loosey-Fur and the sexy but unstable Satantha -- seduce and kidnap one of the world's leading experts on Sasquatch. Under the rule of their dark lord, they indulge in a wild sex-and-killing spree, dragging the captive along into the ultimate confrontation with the object of his lifelong quest. Will they survive THE BLOODY RAGE OF BIGFOOT? Bloody Rage of Bigfoot
